description.narrative: Funding under this initiative supports the Afghanistan bilateral program, specifically program management and technical support costs for implementation of aid activities to Afghanistan; support for in-country implementation, oversight and reporting; and to undertake scoping, design, monitoring and evaluation, technical input into development of thematic and country strategies; program review; governance activities; program travel and related expenditure not related to other specific investments; development of monitoring frameworks, and other related tasks in delivering the Afghanistan aid program. The total value of this initiative is $1.4 million over four years, starting financial year 2017-18 through to 2020-21.

participating-org.narrative: Australia - Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade
